If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. ☐

Item 8.01. Other Events.

On or about July 11, 2024, Virpax Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (the “Company”) issued an aggregate of 1,975,283 shares of its common stock to investors who exercised warrants previously issued by the Company. In connection with such exercise, the Company received proceeds of approximately $2,666,632. The number of shares of the Company’s common stock outstanding immediately after giving effect to these exercises was 4,813,181.

The issuance to investors of the shares of common stock upon exercise of the warrants was registered under a registration statement filed by the Company on Form S-1(File No. 333-278796), which was declared effective on May 14, 2024.

1

Signature

Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized.

VIRPAX PHARMACEUTICALS, INC. Dated: July 15, 2024 By: /s/ Gerald Bruce Name: Gerald Bruce Title: Chief Executive Officer
